DOC.brief_summary: The study design ass steady-state pharmacokinetic profile paroxetine 14 day repeat daily dose control release tablet formulation ( 25 mg ) healthy Chinese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Repeat Dose Pharmacokinetic Study Of Paroxetine CR Tablet In Healthy Chinese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1945 year healthy Chinese subject Body weight > 50 kg BMI 1925 serological negative HIV , syphilis hepatitis B C abnormalities ECG Female negative pregnancy male plan child 3 month study . Exclusion criterion : History chronic physical/mental disease , current disease concomitant medication
